document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Dying </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">hurts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Living </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">hurts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">us </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">more </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">But </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Dying </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">different </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">way </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">kind </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">behind </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Door </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Southern </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Custom </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Bird </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">That </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">ere </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Frosts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">due </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Accepts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">better </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Latitude </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Birds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">stay. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Shiverers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">round </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Farmer's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">doors </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">whose </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">reluctant </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Crumb </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">stipulate </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">till </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">pitying </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Snows </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Persuade </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">our </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Feathers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Home </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: 'Tis not that dying hurts us so
